Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the incident by falsely stating that Health Minister Dr Harsh Vardhan was attacked, when in fact it was an attack on BJP MP Babul Supriyo's convoy.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that Health Minister Dr Harsh Vardhan was attacked.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the person being thrashed in the video is Health Minister Dr Harsh Vardhan without any solid evidence.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video shows an attack on BJP MP Babul Supriyo's convoy in 2016, not on Health Minister Dr Harsh Vardhan.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim presents an alternative explanation by falsely attributing the attack to Health Minister Dr Harsh Vardhan instead of the actual incident involving Babul Supriyo and TMC supporters.
